Title: Permits the court to grant post-conviction motions to vacate a judgment when the issue raised upon such motion is ineffective assistance of counsel
Summary: Permits the court to grant post-conviction motions to vacate a judgment when the issue raised upon such motion is ineffective assistance of counsel in certain cases in which the court would otherwise be required to deny the motion.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to claims of ineffective assistance of counsel in post-conviction motions
